tool_description: Record important events in month and date
name: Events Happened in World
title: Events Happened in World

api_list.name: Get Search
api_list.description: Search what happened in the world by date and month

api_list.name: Get Id Event
api_list.description: Find  Id Event what happened in the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://events-happened-in-world.p.rapidapi.com/id/61d8e80ab07faf65fececedd"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "events-happened-in-world.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://events-happened-in-world.p.rapidapi.com/id/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "events-happened-in-world.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
